A little about me ....

BIO

I’m always looking at, reading about, experimenting with different technologies and techniques. In the evenings or on my lunch breaks you’ll usually find me with my nose buried in an article or listening to a tech podcast, watching YouTube videos on subjects that add value to my endeavors. Most currently I’m working to build a flight simulator setup for the house so that I can practice flying and learn proper procedure for when I go to get my pilots license. Researching the “how to” and learning the “why” makes me a happy person.
